https://x.com/wabuffo/status/1806687566214660229?s=46&t=_sZ6xyyOBuoMYsKE6B_heA

“The Starfish”: Due to strong payroll taxes & large-ish tax collections at  the April & June IRS payment deadlines, the US Federal govt has run a $100b-ish surplus (rather than a deficit) in Q2 (April-June).
This means that the supply of monetary assets has not kept up with nominal 5-6% US…
